casebody.data:
No. 09-8742. Kimberly Albright-Lazzari, et vir, Petitioners v. Connecticut (two judgments). 559 U.S. 1034, 130 S. Ct. 2064,

176 L. Ed. 2d 412,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2898. March 29, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Appellate Court of Connecticut dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
